New Records: Giannis Antetokounmpo became Milwaukee's career leader in offensive rebounds with 1,469, surpassing Marques Johnson's record of 1,468
Key Match Events: Bucks' 17-1 run in the third quarter, led by Lillard and Antetokounmpo, gave them some breathing room
Pre-Game Insights: Milwaukee coach Doc Rivers shuffled his lineup by giving Andre Jackson Jr. his first start of the season and moving Gary Trent Jr. to a bench role
Post-Match Reflections: The Bucks snapped a six-game skid, their first such streak since March 2015
Miscellaneous Highlights: Utah led 71-70 before the Bucks took command, with Lillard and Antetokounmpo combining to score Milwaukee's first 15 points in the 17-1 run
Others: The Jazz went 14 of 26 from beyond the arc in the first half, but were 3 of 15 in the second half
